ISSUE.TITLE: Test against more NodeJS versions
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Testing against a pinned and odd NodeJS release makes not much sense. NodeJS reached its EOL some time ago. Only even release branches are longkiving and become LTS branches. https://github.com/o1lab/xmysql/blob/master/.travis.yml
